name: Propaganda Llama
description: Puzzling and adorable political intrigue. Journey through over 50 llevels of challenging puzzles populated with plenty of llamas.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Dual Core Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Quad Core Intel i7 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce or ATI Radeon DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
